me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar.version.latest

Class BossBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar.BossBar
      • me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar.base.BossBarBase
        • me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar.version.latest.BossBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class BossBar
extends BossBarBase
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    A BossBar intended for server versions >= Version.v1_9_R1.
